law.history: Repealed 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 20, effective August 1, 2008. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 2, effective July 1, 2004. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 547, sec. 6, effective January 1, 2001. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 5, Art. I, sec. 9, effective February 5, 1960.
